summary: My personal Attempt to tweak nightingale cowl and cape, cowl goes with hair, future plan inclues a wide range of color selection. So stay tune.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1106.photobucket.com/albums/h371/meister886/Sig.jpg[/IMG]
My personal Attempt to tweak nightingale cowl and cape, cowl goes with hair.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Update:
Version 1.2 Add Special Addition Ranger Butterfly Cape ( It has over 20,000 faces(other cape has about 3,000 faces), fix black hole issue, more smooth animation, special design for Eison armor),add Red cape&cowl as requested.

Version 1.1 add 2 colored cape, and several hair color.It has clothes,light amor and heavy armor (quite distinctive) version,fully craftable and upgradeable.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
I made it yesterday, \'cos I wanna start a new tune, ranger style, but Skyrim lack stuff of such elements, then I took a shower,made a cup of tea, then work about 5 hrs or so in front of computer. Then here is . It\'s not perfect, and will need further tweak,but it\'s super cool and up to my alley, since lots of requests on this, so now I\'m gonna share with you guys.

the cape\'s using unused slot, so it will not replace anything.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Note:
Version 1.1 has not gone wild test, bugs might occur, who knows, if you have, report back to me
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
How to Get it:
Work at the tanning stand,requires leather,no perk
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:
Manual: just drop in data fold ,check in the launcher .then all set to go.
NMM: you know what to do
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Credit:
Meister falls off cliff for the work on \"MTOH\"
Ren for the original hair back in Oblivion
Bethesda for the marvelous works
Community of Skyrim nexus for help on ironing out some matters.
Caithe for the help, check his mod: [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11768\"]Barrel Outfit[/url]. It\'s super cool!
author: Meister crashes on the floor
